WITH recursive sj(dt, num) AS ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m'), @num := 1 UNION ALL SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH), INTERVAL num MONTH), '%Y-%m'), @num := @num + 1 FROM sj WHERE num < TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,CONCAT('2019-01','-01'),DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH))+1 ), ts AS( SELECT id, ywid, nsrmc, zt, fklx FROM( SELECT id, ywid, nsrmc, zt, fklx, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY nsrmc, ywid ORDER BY tssj DESC) rn FROM t_dbfxxt_fkb WHERE zbdm='tdzrsysfx' ) ts WHERE rn=1 ), td AS( SELECT nsrmc, SUM(ZRMJ) ZRMJ, SUM(yjsk) ynse FROM ( SELECT qlrxm NSRMC, '' ZRMJ, '', COUNT(sj.dt), '' yjsk FROM sj, t_db_zrghj_tdzrxx t where 1 = 1
AND SUBSTR(sj.dt,1,4) = #{qdrq}
AND qlrxm LIKE CONCAT('%',#{nsrmc},'%')
and qlrxm in(select nsrmc from t_db_swj_ybnsrdjxx) GROUP BY qlrxm, id ) tt GROUP BY nsrmc ), sw AS( SELECT nsrmc, SUM(REPLACE(sjje,',','')) sjje FROM t_db_swj_jrkxx t WHERE ZSPM NOT IN ('滞纳金','罚款') AND ZSXM = '城镇土地使用税' AND tzlx IN ('未被调账的税款', '调账后产生的新税款')
AND SUBSTR(t.SKSSQQ,1,4)=#{qdrq}
GROUP BY nsrmc ), sy AS( SELECT nsrmc, SUM(jmstdmj) msmj, SUM(yjmsje) jmje FROM ( SELECT nsrmc, jmstdmj, SUM(yjmsje) yjmsje FROM ( SELECT row_number() over(PARTITION BY nsrmc, tdbh, num ORDER BY yxqq DESC) AS rownum, nsrmc, tdbh, tdyt,zytdmj, yxqq, yxqz, tddj, jmstdmj, yjmsje FROM t_db_swj_tdsyxx t, sj WHERE SUBSTR(t.yxqq, 1, 7) <= sj.dt AND SUBSTR(t.yxqz, 1, 7) >= sj.dt
AND SUBSTR(t.yxqq, 1, 4) <= #{qdrq} AND SUBSTR(t.yxqz, 1, 4) >= #{qdrq} AND SUBSTR(sj.dt,1,4) = #{qdrq}
) t WHERE rownum=1 GROUP BY nsrmc, jmstdmj ) tt GROUP BY nsrmc )
SELECT #{qdrq} qdrq, '合计' nsrmc, FORMAT(SUM(TD.ZRMJ),2) zrmj, FORMAT(SUM(IFNULL(td.ynse, 0)),2) ynse, FORMAT(SUM(IFNULL(sy.msmj,0)), 2) msmj, FORMAT(SUM(IFNULL(sy.jmje,0)), 2) jmse, FORMAT(SUM(IFNULL(sw.sjje,0)), 2) sjje, FORMAT(SUM(IFNULL(sw.sjje, 0) + IFNULL(sy.jmje,0) - IFNULL(td.ynse,0)),2) ce, '' zt, null fkid FROM td LEFT JOIN sw ON td.nsrmc = sw.nsrmc LEFT JOIN sy ON td.nsrmc = sy.nsrmc
where IFNULL(sw.sjje, 0) + IFNULL(sy.jmje,0) - IFNULL(td.ynse,0) < 0
where IFNULL(sw.sjje, 0) + IFNULL(sy.jmje,0) - IFNULL(td.ynse,0) >= 0
UNION ALL
SELECT #{qdrq} qdrq, td.nsrmc, FORMAT(TD.ZRMJ,2) zrmj, FORMAT(IFNULL(td.ynse, 0),2) ynse, FORMAT(IFNULL(sy.msmj,0), 2) msmj, FORMAT(IFNULL(sy.jmje,0), 2) jmse, FORMAT(IFNULL(sw.sjje,0), 2) sjje, FORMAT(IFNULL(sw.sjje, 0) + IFNULL(sy.jmje,0) - IFNULL(td.ynse,0),2) ce, ifnull(ts.zt,'0') zt, ts.id fkid FROM td LEFT JOIN sw ON td.nsrmc = sw.nsrmc LEFT JOIN sy ON td.nsrmc = sy.nsrmc LEFT JOIN ts ON td.nsrmc=ts.nsrmc AND MD5(td.nsrmc)=ts.ywid where 1=1
and ts.id is null
and ts.zt in ('1', '3.1')
and ts.zt = #{zt}
and ts.zt in ('3', '3.0','3.2','3.3')
and IFNULL(sw.sjje, 0) + IFNULL(sy.jmje,0) - IFNULL(td.ynse,0) < 0
and IFNULL(sw.sjje, 0) + IFNULL(sy.jmje,0) - IFNULL(td.ynse,0) >= 0

SELECT id, ywrxm zrf, '' zrffddbr, qlrxm srf, '' srffddbr, ywlx tdwz, '' tdmj, '' zrsj, '' zrzje FROM t_db_zrghj_tdzrxx t
AND srfmc = #{nsrmc}

WITH TD AS( SELECT SRF NSRMC,SUM(TDMJ) * 10000 ZRMJ,SUM(ZRZJE) * 10000 ZRZJE FROM MD_ZRZYJ_TDZRXX WHERE SUBSTR(ZRSJ,0,7) >= #{skssqq} AND SUBSTR(ZRSJ,0,7) <= #{skssqz}
AND SRF LIKE '%'||#{nsrmc}||'%'
GROUP BY SRF ), SW AS( SELECT NSRMC, SUM(DECODE(ZSXM,'契税',SJJE,'0')) QS, SUM(CASE WHEN ZSXM = '印花税' AND ZSPM='产权转移书据' THEN SJJE ELSE '0' END) YHS FROM MD_SWJ_RKXX WHERE SUBSTR(SKSSQQ,0,7) >= #{skssqq} AND SUBSTR(SKSSQQ,0,7) <= #{skssqz} AND ZSPM NOT IN ('滞纳金')
AND NSRMC LIKE '%'||#{nsrmc}||'%'
GROUP BY NSRMC ), TJ AS( SELECT TD.NSRMC,#{skssqq} SKSSQQ,#{skssqz} SKSSQZ,TD.ZRMJ,TD.ZRZJE, TD.ZRZJE*0.03 YNQS,NVL(SW.QS,0) SJQS,NVL(SW.QS,0) - TD.ZRZJE*0.03 QSCE, TD.ZRZJE*0.0005 YNYHS,NVL(SW.YHS,0) SJYHS, NVL(SW.YHS,0) - TD.ZRZJE*0.0005 YHSCE FROM TD,SW WHERE TD.NSRMC = SW.NSRMC(+) ) SELECT * FROM TJ
